mapper.insert: insert into board(board_no, board_start_ref, board_lev, board_seq, board_writer, board_title, board_content, board_viewcnt, board_regdate, board_modidate, board_deldate, user_id, commentcount) values (board_no_seq.nextval, board_no_seq.currval, 0, 0, #{board_writer}, #{board_title}, #{board_content}, 0, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM'), to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS'), 'notdeleted', #{user_id}, 0)
mapper.update: update board set board_viewcnt = board_viewcnt + 1 where board_no = #{board_no}
update board set board_seq = board_seq + 1 where board_start_ref = #{board_start_ref} and board_seq > #{board_seq}
mapper.insert: insert into board(board_no, board_start_ref, board_before_ref, board_lev, board_seq, board_writer, board_title, board_content, board_viewcnt, board_regdate, board_modidate, board_deldate, user_id, commentcount) values (board_no_seq.nextval, #{board_start_ref}, #{board_no}, #{board_lev}+1, #{board_seq}+1, #{board_writer}, #{board_title}, #{board_content}, 0, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM'), to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS'), 'notdeleted', #{user_id}, 0)
mapper.select: select count(*) from board where board_before_ref = #{board_no}
